names.meaning: He who is the universe itself, the all-pervading reality that encompasses everything
names.context: First name signifying Vishnu as cosmic totality
names.benefits: Chanting invokes awareness of universal consciousness

names.meaning: He who pervades everything, present everywhere
names.context: The fundamental nature of the Supreme as omnipresent
names.benefits: Meditation brings awareness of divine presence everywhere

names.meaning: He for whom the sacrificial exclamation 'Vashat' is uttered

names.translation: Lord of Past, Present and Future
names.meaning: The master of all that was, is, and will be
names.benefits: Frees from anxiety about past and future

names.meaning: He who creates all living entities
names.context: The creative aspect of the Supreme
names.benefits: Invokes creative energy and new beginnings

names.meaning: He who supports and nourishes all creatures
He who is pure existence, the essence of being
The inner Self dwelling in all creatures
names.context: Immanence of the Divine in all life
names.benefits: Reveals the divine within all beings

names.meaning: He who causes all beings to manifest and flourish
names.context: Origin and growth of all life

names.meaning: He whose nature is supremely pure and untainted
names.benefits: Purifies the mind and heart of devotee

names.meaning: The highest Self, the Supersoul dwelling in all hearts
names.benefits: Awakens awareness of the indwelling Divine

names.meaning: The ultimate destination of those who attain liberation
He who never diminishes or decays
names.benefits: Grants freedom from fear of death

names.meaning: The primeval person, the conscious principle
names.benefits: Develops loving relationship with the Divine

names.meaning: He who observes all without being affected
names.etymology: sa (with) + aksha (eyes) - one who sees directly

names.meaning: He who knows all bodies and their activities
names.context: The conscious knower within the body-field
names.benefits: Awakens discrimination between body and soul

names.meaning: He who is beyond destruction and decay
He who is attainable through yoga; the means and goal of yoga
names.context: Path and destination of spiritual practice

names.meaning: He who guides all practitioners of yoga
The controller of both primordial matter and consciousness
names.context: Supremacy over material and spiritual realms
names.benefits: Harmonizes matter and spirit in life

names.meaning: He who assumed the form of half-man, half-lion
He who is adorned with all divine opulences
He with beautiful, flowing locks; slayer of demon Keshi
He who is the highest among all beings
He who is everything that exists
He who destroys all that is inauspicious
He who is supremely benevolent and auspicious
He who is firm and unshakeable like a pillar
He who is the primordial cause of all elements
names.benefits: Connects to the source of all manifestation

names.meaning: He who is the never-diminishing storehouse of all wealth
names.benefits: Opens access to infinite divine resources

names.meaning: He who manifests by His own will
He who gives existence to all beings
names.etymology: From 'bhu' - to be, bring into being

names.meaning: He who bears the burden of maintaining creation
He from whom everything originates
names.benefits: Reveals the source of all phenomena

names.meaning: He who has supreme authority over all
He who has complete control over all
names.benefits: Brings order and control in life

names.meaning: He who exists by Himself, uncaused
He who grants bliss and prosperity
He who appeared as Vamana, son of Aditi
names.context: Avatar born to cosmic mother Aditi

names.meaning: He whose eyes are beautiful like lotus petals
He from whom emanates the primordial sound
names.context: Source of cosmic vibration and Vedas
names.benefits: Attunes to sacred sound and mantras

names.meaning: He who has no origin and no conclusion
names.benefits: Transcends fear of death and birth

names.meaning: He who ordains and establishes cosmic order
names.benefits: Establishes dharma and order in life

names.meaning: He who dispenses the fruits of karma
He who is the highest among all creators
He who cannot be measured or comprehended
He who is the master of all sense organs
He from whose navel springs the cosmic lotus
He who is the master of all gods
He who is the creator of the entire universe
He who deliberates and establishes dharma
He who shapes and fashions all forms
He who is supremely vast in dimension
He who is eternally ancient yet unchanging
He who cannot be seized or held by senses
He who exists perpetually without change
He who is dark-complexioned; all-attractive
He whose eyes are tinged with red from compassion
He who destroys completely at the time of pralaya
He who is always complete and abundant
He who is the dwelling of the three quarters of existence
He who purifies everything
He who is the highest auspiciousness
He who controls and rules everything
He who bestows life-force to all
He who is the vital breath in all beings
He who is the most ancient
He who is superior to all
He who is the father and protector of all beings
He who is the cosmic womb containing the universe
He who contains the earth within Himself
He who is the husband of Ma (Lakshmi); born in Madhu dynasty
He who destroyed the demon Madhu
He who has supreme power over all
He who possesses supreme prowess
He who holds the divine bow Sharnga
He who possesses infinite wisdom
He who takes mighty strides
He who is the orderly sequence of creation
He who has none superior to Him
He who cannot be overcome or opposed
He who knows all actions and their doers
He who is Himself the act of creation
He who is established in His own Self
He who is the supreme ruler of all deities
He who is the ultimate shelter for all
He who is supreme happiness and joy
He whose seed is the universe
He from whom all creatures originate
He who is the radiance of the day
He who is time as the cycle of year
He who is as mysterious as the cosmic serpent
He who is the basis of all knowledge and faith
He who sees everything everywhere
He who is never born
He who is the supreme lord of everything
He who is ever-perfect and complete
He who is the goal and fulfillment
He who is the first cause of everything
He who never falls from His status
